Lewis Stein

Paths, 2008 – This is an ongoing series. Dimensions are variable and listed on links from thumb nails. Each piece will be face mounted to non-reflective plexiglas and backed by 1/4" clear plexiglas to shape of image (see "installation view of one" below.)
